_TC_INLINE void avsRegRead (  uint32  registerOffset,
uint32 *  value
) 
 

Reads a value from the AVS.

Parameters:
registerOffset The register offset to read.
value The read value will be placed at this location.

_TC_INLINE void avsRegWrite (  uint32  registerOffset,
uint32  value
) 
 

Writes a value to the AVS.

Parameters:
registerOffset The register offset to write.
value The value to be written.
